title: 逃离网络世界III
author: MCBBS.mcbbs
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MCBBS.mcbbs 于 2015-12-18 16:50 编辑 

                                 Hello大家好，我是小仙，那么我又回来了，经过一段时间的磨练，我又懂了很多知识哦！！所以我又做成了地图，把我最近学的知识都凝聚在了里面，这次不再单单是单调的闯关跑酷解密了！！我这次加了很多命令方块！！你也别担心你会卡，我家电脑很渣，但是也不卡，除非你的电脑比我家电脑渣我就不敢保证你卡不卡了。可能有些人会认为我那么长时间不更新地图，是要弃坑，我这里留一句话，我不会弃坑的！！“逃离网络世界”这个地图是我第一部作品，怎么能弃坑呢！？好吧，我们就不多说了，上图！
                                                                      嘿嘿，这次我会截图了，所以图比较多你们准备好哦~~~
      转载请注明出处！！！！
                                         强调一遍！！！！！！！版本1.7.2！！！！！！！[diamond_ore]               图片                file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.06.57.png     [diamond_ore]
                                                                                初始小屋全景file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.06.57.png 初始小屋内部file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.07.13.png “我”的家file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.07.46.png “我”的家内部file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.08.35.png 阴森小屋内部file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.09.18.png 阴森小屋全景file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.09.45.png 逃脱追捕file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.10.18.png 天旋地转file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.11.13.png 神秘小屋file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.11.56.png 另外附上几张线路图： file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.12.40.png file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.13.03.png file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.13.25.png file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/Minecraft-LAN-12.11/.minecraft/screenshots/2015-01-09_22.13.39.png 
                                                                              好吧，图片就到这里，希望大家自己去玩玩，也希望大家拍成视频，呃，不多说了那么这次就到这吧我们下次再见，拜拜~
  哦，对了，下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1sOGhS虽然上面有但我还是再写一次吧~~~还有再一次说一遍！版本，是1.7.2哦~
